author: trimetilo
content:

prysm_1  | time="2023-03-06 02:40:12" level=info msg="Validating blobs" aggregatedProof=0xc00000000000 commitments=0 root=0x9332496d3de2 sidecarBlobs=0 slot=285941

author: prestonvanloon
content: <@675104584481374226> can you give any other info? What commit were you running? Was there any other logs? I don't see a crash or exit log from prysm
